comment: Yay for Andy ! He deserves love and to have something that is just his . He'll have a proper hug / kiss this New Year <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Yay for Andy ! He deserves love and to have something that is just his . He'll have a proper hug / kiss this New Year <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (y / yay
            :beneficiary (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Andy")))
      :snt2 (d / deserve-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (l / love-01
                        :ARG1 p)
                  :op2 (h / have-03
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (s / something
                              :poss p
                              :mod (j / just)))))
      :snt3 (s2 / slash
            :op1 (h2 / hug-01
                  :ARG0 (h3 / he)
                  :mod (p2 / proper))
            :op2 (k / kiss-01
                  :ARG0 h3
                  :mod p2)
            :time (f / festival
                  :name n
                  :op1 "New"
                  :op2 "Year")
            :mod (t / this)))

comment: We all deserve love ! Animals are no exception !
amr:
# ::snt We all deserve love ! Animals are no exception !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / deserve-01
            :ARG0 (w / we
                  :mod (a / all))
            :ARG1 (l / love-01
                  :ARG1 w))
      :snt2 (e / except-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (a2 / animal)))
